name: SynchTank
tag_list: sync-licensing, cloud, music-licensing, online-software, music, digital-media, sync, music-software, licensing-software, music-synch, music-sync, synchronization
overview:
SynchTank is a cloud-based digital media asset management and licensing solutions for music publishers, labels, composers, managers, recording/film studios, creative agencies, and more.

Highly configurable platform that provides your business with an interactive portal and internal system through which to control, pitch, deliver, and license your creative digital assets and catalogues from anywhere, operate more efficiently, reach customers and licensees directly, and keep 100% of your revenue.

» Online assets and catalog management.

» Fully automated, algorithm driven descriptive track analysis and search (never key in anything by hand).

» Integrated pitching, marketing and delivery modules. » Online video synchronization suite.

» Automated licensing and payment gateway.

» Detailed portal, user/campaign metrics and reports.

We are powering a growing roster of interactive catalogs from many of the industry’s most innovative companies, including: Primary Wave, Budde Music, Wind-up Records, 20th Century Fox Music, HoriPro, Ghostly International, The Orchard, Reservoir Media, Homeschool Entertainment (John Legend), Metropolis Studios, ATC Management (Faithless, Band of Skulls), and Silva Screen, just to name a few.

SynchTank is a privately held firm with offices in Brooklyn, NY and London, UK.
